WorkItem.Description: For some reason whenever I import my cat spec, it always thinks (or does it even try to detect it?) that I am importing bear spec. Well... I don't have 3/3 Thick hide (only 2/3 for my cat spec) or 2/2 Natural Reaction (which is like MUST for every self respecting bear) or Pulverize...

Comments.Message: It currently goes by whether you have any points in Thick Hide, which you only should ever have in a Bear spec.
Says who? This is very good cat survival talent also. Bear needs it 3/3 tough. But the talent this detector should consider instead of thick hide is Natural Reaction, which is only bear talent.
Says me. No, a Cat spec should not include Thick Hide. If you have Thick Hide, you're not spending points in several other more beneficial talents.

If you have any points in either Thick Hide or Natural Reaction, then you're not using a Cat spec; that's at the least a 'hybrid' spec. The optional talents for Cats include Infected Wounds, Brutal Impact, Nurturing Instinct, Perseverance, and Survival Instincts.
